model_description: Enhanced ML analysis for Ziniosa: Outcome prediction used LogisticRegression with hyperparameter tuning (F1-score: 0.75). Training data loaded from ./training_datasets/ with 12 samples. Time series analysis enhanced with exponential smoothing and robust statistics. Sentiment analysis applied enhanced VADER to 1 document sections with validation. Edge cases handled: negative growth, missing data, outliers via winsorization. Projections include confidence intervals and realistic capping (revenue ≤1500%, profit ≤1000%). All metrics validated and rounded to 2 decimal places. Full model performance metrics and traceability in explainability files.
